Name: Gophish
Description: Gophish is an open-source phishing framework designed to make it easy to test and train employees against phishing attacks.
HTU: Install Gophish, configure phishing campaigns, and launch them to assess user susceptibility.

Name: Phishing Frenzy
Description: Phishing Frenzy is a fully open-source Ruby on Rails application designed to manage and execute email phishing campaigns.
HTU: Install Phishing Frenzy, configure email templates and target lists, and launch phishing campaigns.

Name: King Phisher
Description: King Phisher is a phishing campaign toolkit used to simulate real-world phishing attacks.
HTU: Install King Phisher, configure campaigns, and execute phishing simulations.

Name: SET (Social-Engineer Toolkit)
Description: SET is an open-source penetration testing framework designed for social engineering attacks, including phishing.
HTU: Install SET, run `setoolkit`, and select the desired phishing attack vector from the menu.

Name: Evilginx2
Description: Evilginx2 is a man-in-the-middle attack framework used for phishing login credentials and session cookies.
HTU: Install Evilginx2, configure phishing sites, and use it to capture login credentials and session tokens.
